sqlMap.select: SELECT t.user_id AS userId, t.user_name AS userName, t.passport, t.password, t.state FROM boss_tb_user t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.passport = upper(#possport#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE boss_tb_user t SET t.modify_date = NOW(), t.modify_user = #modifyUser#, t.password = #password# WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.passport = upper(#passport#)
